name: Gunpowder (itch)
description:
Zombies are invading the old west, and Ulysses Gunpowder is ready to defend the saloon with his life. He won't stop holding down the trigger until every last zombie is dead, which may make things a little tough to control...

Can you survive all 16 waves?

Use the [Mouse] to aim. Select your weapon slot with the [Mouse wheel], [1-3], or [Q/E]. [Click] to purchase items or start the next wave. Press [M] to toggle mute. Good luck!

Made for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam with the theme "out of control."

Code & voices by Joshua Edwards (@glenk_), art & animation by Cosmo Wegman (@crelishboy), and music by Aaron Weatherford (@atw_composer).
